member.name: T:ClosestElementsProblem.Program
member.summary:
Given a sorted array arr[] and a value X, find the k closest elements to X in arr[].
A simple solution is to do linear search for k closest elements. 1. Start from the first element and search for the crossover point (The point before which elements are smaller than or equal to X and after which elements are greater). This takes O(n) time 2. Once we find the crossover point, we can compare elements on both sides of the crossover point to print k closest elements. This step takes O(k) time.
